arts.ttl: Jonson Clarke-Harris earns Rotherham a point at Shrewsbury
arts.sum: George Lloyd had put the Shrews ahead.

arts.ttl: Liam Dooley gives hopeful Shrewsbury Town takeover timeline
arts.sum: And while any interested buyers and the club have not gone into an exclusivity period, Dooley, who has recently become a director at the Croud Meadow, says he is hopeful something will be done before the end of the current campaign. "But what I would say is, if the people who want to buy the football club for the values that we are talking about at the moment – then the deal can be done.

arts.ttl: Shrewsbury Town making promising progress over possible sale
arts.sum: These things are subject to due diligence processes – not only the purchase part but also making sure after all the work the chairman has done over the last 28 years he does not want to just sell it to the first person who knocks on the door without checking what their plans are for the club. He said: “It would be because we are now looking at going into an exclusivity period, but we have got to look at the right deal and make sure we are doing the right things for the football club.

arts.ttl: Preview: Shrewsbury Town vs. Rotherham United - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Shrewsbury Town and Rotherham United, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
